nodes.text: The Warchigade system was a star system that was located within the Outer Rim Territories' Toblain sector. The system shared its name with the hyperlane known as the Warchigade trade route.
The Warchigade system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-18.
